name: Dx Spot
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Dx Spot is an application based crypto trading bot platform that can place trades 24/7 on crypto exchanges. Dx Spot is a simple and intuitive application for crypto beginners or experts to set up and run. Dx Spot has a DXS token which is a utility token in the Dx Spot ecosystem. It can be used in the staking program and can also be considered a long-term investment as a store of value.
